title: Leeds United Live: Bolton 1-1 Leeds United - BBC News
summary: shola ameobi scores on debut to give bolton the lead .
leeds unchanged ; no heskey for bolton .
all of the action and reaction as leeds united play bolton .

documents.title: good eveningbolton 1-1 leeds
text: another day , another draw for steve evans .
leeds were missing the spark they had against fulham , and although they came back well in the second half , they will regard today as a missed opportunity .
you can listen to what steve evans had to say here and we will , of course , be back on thursday for leeds ' home clash with blackburn .
thanks for joining us and have a great evening .

documents.title: more from evansbolton 1-1 leeds
text: `` we may be overloaded with players that are n't going to play , '' evans told adam pope .
`` the goal would n't have happened if it had been dealt with .
in football , people do make little areas but then you re-acclimatise .
`` we need players that can deliver that bit of quality because we are going to dominate games . ''
`` neil lennon knows we should have won , i know we should have won and i think he 'll be happy with a point . ''

documents.title: evans on today 's gamebolton 1-1 leeds
text: `` we 've got the same feeling today that we had against fulham , '' evans told bbc leeds .
`` it 's been frustrating today .
we 've laid siege to the final third .
`` we have to work on the final ball .
we 're pleased with their reaction - the fighting spirit and their desire - and they ca n't give us more .
but we have to get it right in the final third . ''

documents.title: katherine on today 's gamebolton 1-1 leeds
text: emotions seem to swing back and forth .
we were full of positivity before we came but now we 're a bit down .
fulham felt like a winning draw but this did n't .
15 years ago today it was a 1-1 draw with barcelona - it 's a very different leeds united now .
author: Katherine Hannah
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: noel on the lack of leeds strikersbolton 1-1 leeds
text: let 's not forget we have lee erwin coming back .
we have n't got a vast array of strikers so he will know that if he gets a chance , he 'll have to take it .
a lot of leeds fans want to see what we brought in this summer .
we have n't seen enough of erwin on the pitch and when he comes back from his spell , he 'll be match fit and hungrier to play .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: more thoughts from noelbolton 1-1 leeds
text: we went in positive .
we knew it would be difficult but felt we had enough in the squad to win
we huffed and puffed the first half and then were much brighter in the second half and that tempo caused problems .
leeds badly needed that first win and we 're still waiting for it .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: noel on today 's resultbolton 1-1 leeds
text: we did n't make the most of the first 45 minutes .
our tempo was n't right , we were sloppy with our passing and we did n't string enough together .
when we did create chances , we were n't strong enough in front of goal .
that 's been the story of the season so far -not defending right , making mistakes and relying on a set piece to get us into the game .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: get involvedbolton 1-1 leeds
text: what do you make to that performance , leeds fans ?
should leeds have snaffled a winner ?
tweet us @ twitterid

documents.title: full time : bolton 1-1 leeds
text: another 1-1 for steve evans then , courtesy of mirco antenucci 's penalty .
that was another spirited fightback from leeds after going 1-0 down in the first half .
there are still problems for evans to address - his side 's tendency to concede first and the form of their keeper silvestri are the major issues of the day .
however he can be content with the way the second half played out although he would dearly love a win .
we 'll have exclusive post-match reaction from evans shortly .

documents.title: bolton 1-1 leeds
text: close from mowatt , who curls his free kick in but ben amos gathers it cleanly .

documents.title: bolton 1-1 leeds
text: buckley is in the thick of it by the net , knocking down crosses from both antenucci and adeyemi , but he ca n't covert either into a shot .
there 's a shot from adeyemi but it deflects wide again - three minutes of added time , can leeds steal a victory ?

documents.title: bolton 1-1 leeds
text: bolton seem quite content to take a point away as they sit on the game , just knocking the ball around .
there 's a substitution for leeds however , as lewis cook is replaced by kalvin phillips .

documents.title: bolton 1-1 leeds
text: buckley takes a run down the right and cuts the ball in , but his cross is low and ben amos is easily able to gather it .

documents.title: bolton 1-1 leeds
text: bolton are trying to take as much time out as possible , courtesy of neil lennon 's dance moves on the side of the pitch as he tells ben amos to take his time with a free-kick .
the ball falls to will buckley , as he chests the ball down , but he ca n't shape to take a shot and bolton are able to clear .

documents.title: bolton 1-1 leeds
text: leeds are doing their best to build towards another goal .
antenucci again breaks and come close , but he 's flagged for being off-side .

documents.title: bolton 1-1 leeds
text: a change for leeds , as will buckley replaces stuart dallas .
bolton again come close , as liam feeney sells mowatt the dummy , but he tips his shot over the bar .

documents.title: breakinggoal antenucci : bolton 1-1 leeds
text: it 's mirco antenucci , not chris wood , who takes the penalty .
he 's fired wide twice in this half , but he 's not missing out on the penalty as he fires the ball straight down the middle to equalise .
a deserved reward from leeds after they 'd dominated the play in this session , not to mention silvestri 's fantastic save to deny bolton .

documents.title: penalty leeds - bolton 1-0 leeds
text: antenucci is brought down in the area by prince-desire gouano - he 's shown a red and leeds are awarded another penalty .
in the build up to that there was an excellent save from silvestri to deny stephen dobbie .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: leeds have had the majority of possession in this half , and they 're asking more questions of bolton 's defence .
bolton , for their part , have hung on to their lead as best they can .
leeds are constantly attacking them though .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: steve evans is fuming on the sidelines as silvestri sends another touch straight to an opposition player .
antenucci , however , is doing his best .
dallas makes a good run down the right but antenucci opts to shoot rather than feed through to him .
he 's too far on the right , however , and the ball sails well high of the goal .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: the quality on the ball from the wide areas is n't good enough .
they 've not been on it today .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: close again for leeds as wood meets a header , but he collides with keeper ben amos .
seconds later , adeyemi hits the post yet again .
he was 20 yards out and fired it in at some pace , but again he could n't get his radar right .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: shola ameobi is searching for his second , trying to lift one over the heads of the leeds defenders .
there 's a nice bit of play from ameobi and liam feeney , before substitute stephen dobbie comes close .
silvestri is quick , however , and gathers the attempts easily - and , crucially , safely .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: a frantic start here as bolton recover from that leeds burst and break .
adeyemi is quick , getting the ball away from feeney , but they conceed a corner that eventually sails harmlessly past the defence .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: an early chance in the second half for leeds as antenucci breaks .
bolton are just caught dozing but antenucci spears his shot wide and into the side netting .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: we 're underway again at the macron stadium , where alex mowatt has replaced luke murphy .
can leeds pull a goal or two back ?

documents.title: fortress elland roadbolton v leeds
text: steve evans has spoken to bbc leeds this week about making elland road a fortress for the club once again .
united have n't won at home since february 2015 , and they lost three consecutive matches there that resulted in uwe rosler 's sacking .
`` it is a major thing to change , '' evans said , `` that an opposition manager thinks i will take a point at elland road .
`` i think we need to create that atmosphere and the only way we can create that enthusiasm ( from the fans ) is for the product to be right . ''

documents.title: `` it 's magnificent ! `` bolton v leeds
text: leeds have spoken to former leeds united striker tony yeboah on his work with the club .
yeboah works for the club 's charitable foundation , and he is happy to be involved with leeds again .
`` i 'm very excited to see the leeds fans again , '' he told adam pope .
`` it 's been a long time and i ca n't wait . ''
you can hear the interview here .

documents.title: noel on the goalbolton 1-0 leeds
text: this punching thing is n't working .
he 's come flying out like superman and you 're expecting him to take it into his body .
he 's come out flapping , it 's gone out for a corner and then leeds have n't marked up properly .
he one man you should be marking , ameobi , is n't marked .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: half-time : bolton 1-0 leeds
text: 530 days since shola ameobi scored a goal - and he 's put bolton in front against leeds .
it 's deja vu for leeds fans , trailing after 30 minutes , and there 's a brief chorus of boos from the packed away end .
they 've not been as strong as they were against fulham , with both wood and adeyemi seeing good chances go begging .
can they change their fortunes after the break ?
get in touch with us @ twitterid

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: two minutes of added time , with bolton content to sit back and leeds trying their best to change their fortunes before the break .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: some good build-up from leeds , but dallas ' cross is n't strong enough and amos takes it easily .
wood , seven yards out , turns and shoots but a good save from amos keeps the ball away .
a nice little run for leeds but there was no real power behind wood 's shot .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: it 's sloppy from leeds at the moment - both bamba and byram have gone into two tackles that they 've instantly apologised for .
they 're just going a bit too hard at the moment .
bottom of the league bolton , meanwhile , are more then happy to sit back and hold on to this lead until half-time .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: good save from silvestri stops bolton having another .
it 's a powerful strike from feeney , who has been very good this half , and silvestri dives and smothers the ball .

documents.title: bolton 1-0 leeds
text: steve evans is not a happy bunny on the sidelines - the game had died down but that mistake from silvestri has cost leeds .

documents.title: breakinggoal ameobi : bolton 1-0 leeds
text: ameobi has scored on his debut for bolton , and i 'm afraid that 's partly been caused by keeper silvestri .
feeney crossed in and out came silvestri - he missed the ball by a long way and leeds knocked it out of play to avoid the bolton attack that was racing forwards .
derik 's corner flies to ameobi , who fires a low cross straight through silvestri .
as is often the case , half an hour gone and leeds are trailing .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: a great ball from murphy to byram has byram driving forward , but pratley is more than equal to it and catches him .
wood takes a slight knock on the ankle from wheater - the ref has a quick word and leeds take a free kick .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: things have quietened down now on the pitch , after an attacking fifteen minutes or so from both sides .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: leeds have been nice and positive down the left hand side .
we could do wth quicker passing and quicker movement , really get at the bolton defence .
leesd are causing problems from the set pieces - we 've had a few corners now that have ricocheted wide .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: `` bolton are not looking like a side that are lacking in confidence , '' says adam pope , as feeney yet again comes close .
he sells his marker the dummy and shoots - but it is just wide of the far post .
it 's not wide by much , beating silvestri 's dive , but this is good , positive play from bolton .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: two good blocks from bamba get leeds out of trouble .
davies shoots for bolton after a good cross from ameobi - bamba blocks it twice , before murphy somehow manages to block feeney 's follow up .
leeds were very nearly caught napping then .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: adeyemi hits the post for leeds !
a lovely little flick through from cooper allows adeyemi to stick his foot out .
it probably should have gone sailing into the middle of the net - instead , it bounces off the bar and out of play .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: half a chance from bolton from their first corner of the game , as prately tips a glancing header over the bar .
leeds ' defence were nowhere near that - a slight cause for concern for steve evans .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: quite a lengthy break in play as bolton 's madine is down with an injury .
it might be a slight concussion - he looks very groggy and he 's being helped from the pitch .
not a good sign for bolton .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: first real chance for leeds come through antenucci , who breaks and runs but scuffs his pass to byram .
byram , on the right , ca n't get to the pass and the ball rolls out of play .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: first corner for leeds , courtesy of a nice little nutmeg from cook .
it sails past the box harmlessly - there 's no-one really taking the initiative so far .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: it 's a bit of a battle , like head tennis , at the minute .
the game has n't settled down and got any flow to it .
if anyone 's had the better of the opening minutes , it 's bolton .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: cook is on the left for leeds today .
the whites have an early free kick , but it 's long and does n't really amount to anything .

documents.title: bolton 0-0 leeds
text: bolton will kick off at a baltic macron stadium .
can leeds register their first win - and their seventh in 11 games against bolton - under steve evans ?

documents.title: 15 years ago todaybolton v leeds
text: it 's 15 years ago today that leeds united drew 0-0 with barcelona in the champions league .
lee bowyer 's early strike put leeds in front and they were on course to pull off a shock victory and knock out barcelona .
it was n't to be , however , as rivaldo 's stoppage-time strike kept barcelona in .

documents.title: so very tuneful bolton v leeds

documents.title: popey on boltonbolton v leeds
text: bolton are in a sorry state at the bottom of the championship .
they are set to give a debut on a `` pay as you play '' basis to former newcastle striker shola ameobi .
the trotters have scored just nine goals this season and have failed to find the net in five matches .
they have a shocking home record and have not won for six games.evans is , however , a big admirer of wanderers boss neil lennon from his time in charge of celtic .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: eye on the oppositionbolton v leeds
text: bolton 's last victory against leeds , 4-1 in may 2004 , effectively relegated the whites from the premier league .
they have had a lean time since however , winning one of their last ten home games against leeds .
they have lost six times , the most recent a 1-0 victory for leeds in august 2014 .
bolton have actually won just one home game this season against wolves back in september .

documents.title: `` it 's a scandalous thing to say '' bolton v leeds
text: steve evans has denied saying he would never manage leeds united .
`` what a scandalous , horrible thing to attribute to steve evans , '' he told bbc leeds .
`` rotherham played a lot of games and i only ever described one game as 'this is the big game . '
`` for rotherham fans , it was sheffield wednesday .
not for steve evans .
`` when i spoke about leeds i spoke about them being giants , historically , and to get quotes attributed where you say you would n't take the job - its scandalous . ''

documents.title: popey on evansbolton v leeds
text: there 's undoubtedly been an upsurge in optimism and energy amongst the fans and squad since wednesday 's draw at fulham .
united really need that win to add to their decent away form and begin what evans says is the club 's `` bounce into the top half . ''
evans has suggested changes could be made but was not giving too much away other than to say how talented a midfielder alex mowatt is .
charlie taylor , ross turnbull and tommaso bianchi remain sidelined .
author: Adam Pope
BBC West Yorkshire Sport

documents.title: leeds and the premier leaguebolton v leeds
text: leeds have n't been in the premier league since the 2003/04 season , but steve evans thinks they can mount a serious challenge .
`` we all know leeds should play in the premier league and i want to be the guy who takes them there , '' he told adam pope .
`` it 's about stepping stones .
the winning feeling has n't been in the dressing room for a while .
`` i want people to fear going to elland road . ''

documents.title: noel on today 's teambolton v leeds
text: doukara on the bench gives us another option .
we are light in the strikers department moreso now erwin is away , but once h'es finished that loan spell he 'll be back and hopefully we 'll see more of him .
we brought him in for a reason - it would be nice to see more of him and what he can offer to the team .
author: Noel Whelan
Ex-Leeds United striker

documents.title: breakingteam newsbolton v leeds
text: leeds are unchanged from wednesday 's game , with chris wood fit to start despite a knock .
jordan botaka is ill , so he 's replaced on the bench by souleymane doukara .
leeds united xi : silvestri , byram , cooper , bamba , berardi , dallas , adeyemi , murphy , cook , antenucci , wood .
bolton wanderers xi : amos , derik , prince , wheater , casado , vela , pratley , danns , davies , feeney , madine .

documents.title: periscope previewbolton v leeds
text: leeds - fueled by tea and onion rings , by the looks of things - have done a preview of today 's game on periscope .
there 's also a few words from andrew hughes , former leeds united midfielder who is currently the professional development coach at bolton .
katherine hannah

documents.title: good afternoonbolton v leeds
text: happy saturday , football fans , and welcome to this afternoon 's live coverage of bolton wanderers v leeds united .
it may have ended up 1-1 , but steve evans made an positive start to his time at leeds united in wednesday 's clash with fulham .
evans can take heart from his side 's record against today 's opponents bolton , who have lost their last three home games against the whites .
keep an eye on us while you listen to the match on bbc radio leeds on 92.4 fm & freeview channel 719 to see if leeds can claim that elusive home victory .
kick off is at 15:00 bst .
